body.name: OTOUCH Projector Native 1080P 18000LM 5G WiFi Bluetooth 4K Support with 4P/8D Keystone/Phone Sync/HiFi Speakers/BT Remote/50% Zoom/500'' /Portable Case for Phone PC TV Stick PPT Home Ourdoor Gaming
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 38 mins
features: 【18000LM/800ANSI--50% Brightness Improve】 This video projector has 18000 lumens (800ANSI) ultra-high brightness and Native 1920*1080P resolution, supports to play 4K source video(but playback in 1080P resolution) which can provide you with high brightness and high definition. In addition, its HI-FI stereo dual speakers, 500'' giant projection size will provide you with cinema-level enjoyment. （Note: Using the projector in a dark environment will get a better viewing experience）

【IOS/Android Phone Screen Sync & 5G/2.4G Dual-Band WIFI--No lag, Smoother】This wireless projector supports 5G/2.4G dual-band WiFi, which can reduce video loading delay, make it faster and smoother to stream video. It supports ios Screen Mirroring and Android Wireless Display, no wire connection is required , make it easy to create a home theatre. (Note: Phone wired projection is not supported)(You need a TV Stick if you want to enjoy movies from Netflix, Disney, Amazon Prime, Hulu and Youtube)

【Bluetooth Remote Control/Two Way Bluetooth】Our upgraded Bluetooth remote control eliminates blind spots in traditional IR RC, allowing for smooth control of the projector at any angle. Our projector doubles as a Bluetooth speaker, thanks to its two built-in HiFi speakers. For even better audio quality when streaming video, you can connect it to an external Bluetooth speaker. Note: It does not support Dolby, so make sure to set the audio output to stereo on your streaming device to get sound.

【±50° 4 Points Keystone Correction, Support Side Cast/ZOOM Function】 With latest four points keystone technology, four corners of projector image can be adjusted individually in ±50° direction, allowing for side casting. The 50%-100% ZOOM function allows you to adjust the size of the projected image without physically moving the projector. Additionally, with HDMI port, AV port, two USB ports, it can be connected to PS5, Switch, Blu-ray DVD, Computer, Laptop, USB Stick; TV box, Amazon Stick

【Big Size, Better Heat Dissipation/3 Years Warranty】Small size projector has poor heat dissipation, so their screen are easily burnt or baked yellow and shorten using life. We make it bigger for better heat dissipation, not easy to burn the screen, we also provide a portable carrying case. Note: Be careful not to block the bottom vent, to prevent the inability to dissipate heat resulting in burned screen. We provide 3 years warranty & lifetime technical support. If any problems occurs, PM us.

Lamp LED Image System LCD Native Resolution 1920*1080 Refresh Rate 60Hz Operation Manual/Remote Control Size 31×27×16 cm Input Voltage 100V-240V 50/60Hz Image Size 35-500 inch Aspect Ratio 4:3/16:9 Hi-Fi Speakers Dual Hi-Fi Speakers (4Ω5W*2) Interface USB*2/HDMI/AV/Aux Keystone 4 Points Keystone Correction Projector Installstion Ceiling Mount/Table Mount/Tripod Mount Working Temperature -10-36℃ Throw Ratio 1.4:1 Image Contrast Ratio 12000:1

Notes--Please Read Carefully Before Purchasing and Using Due to the HDCP protocol, the projector cannot directly play movies from Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu App. You can use a TV stick to connect to the projector to watch movies from Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu.Because of the high-brightness bulbs, we have bigger fans for heat dissipation, so there will be some noise, but our speakers are also powerful enough that watching videos will not be affected at all. Due to copyright issues of Dolby Audio, this projector does not support Dolby. If it has no sound, go to setting of your streaming device and select Surround Audio option as ‘PCM’ instead of ‘Best Possible’ to get sound.Since there are many problems with the wired connection of the mobile phone, the wired connection of the mobile phone is not supported. It is more convenient to use a mobile phone wireless connection.There has an air inlet on the bottom of the projector. Please avoid other objects blocking the air inlet during using the projector or it will burn screen black.The remote control needs 2 AAA batteries to start, our remote control does not contain batteries. If it still doesn't work after installing the batteries, you can pm us for a free replacement.Using the projector in a dark environment will get a better viewing experience.For office use, we recommend purchasing a more professional projector.It is not Android projector.There is no interface jack on the back, so it can be placed directly with the lens facing up to project up to ceiling.

Screen Mirroring is not available for iPhone? Due to Apple's system update, iPhone with iOS 16.2 cannot share screen with the projector. How to deal with it: 1. Update your iOS system to iOS 16.3; 2. Or PM us for the latest projector firmware. Only sound but no picture? Due to the limitation of HDCP protocol, projector can't play videos from Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney, Hulu, Youtube through phone casting, we suggest using TV Stick or HDMI connection to play videos from Netflix, Disney, Amazon Prime, Hulu,.etc. No sound, only images? Due to copyright issue, K3 does not support Dolby Audio, so there will be no sound. You can go to the settings of your streaming device and select Surround Audio option as ‘PCM’ instead of ‘Best Possible’ to get sound. How to get sound while using Fire Stick To enable audio while using a Fire Stick, navigate to the Display & Sounds menu and select the the PCM option to play the audio; How do I adjust the brightness of the projector? A: Play the video with U disk, press the OK button of the remote control to bring up the menu bar, click the rightmost setting button and select picture mode to adjust the brightness. You can also search 'OTOUCH HOW TO ADJUST BRIGHTNESS' on Youtube.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Realiable and fantastic quality
reviews.reviewText: I've used this projector for a while before giving it a full review. I've tried many projectors before of varying quality and price and this has been an amazing projector for frequent use.Picture Quality: The picture quality is really great. The projector is very bright and the picture comes through well with this projector. Very impressed with the quality so far, there are also no dark spots, no bends, and overall no issue with the picture quality at all. It can also be stretched pretty wide and still looks very clear. Fantastic for an outdoor setup at night (I doubt it would be bright enough to use in the day).Settings: Great settings for keystone and digital adjustment as well as manual adjustment. Had no issues dialing in the right settings for the best picture quality.Connection: Allows for bluetooth connections and comes with many ports on the side which I prefer than having ports on the back. Having side ports means if I mount this device to a wall I will have an easier time with managing the wires.Speakers: Surprisingly good as well, these speakers are loud and can fill the whole room. Sound quality is not bad at all, I still prefer using my own external bluetooth speakers but the built-in speakers are more than serviceable.Latency: For bluetooth connections there isn't any noticeable latency, I've had a solid experience with the bluetooth so far. The latency between the picture and input is also pretty low. Which means that this projector is also suitable for casual gaming.Overall this projector surpassed my expectations in several categories and has been in use for over two months before this review without any loss in quality or problems with heat or noise. The projector is very quiet and does not get super hot. Great picture quality and delivers in all areas, extremely solid projector at an affordable cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One of the brighter projectors we tried, but otherwise it's not much better than others
reviews.reviewText: We tried out about 6 different projectors in our search for a good projector for outside movie night and basement use (for the kids) and while this one had a few notable pros that set it slightly apart for the most part it's ultimately just average. This one also fell on the costlier end of the spectrum with little to show for that valuation except brightness.And to be fair, it IS significantly brighter than a number of others out there - which is good if you don't want to be forced to wait until nightfall outside or being forced to block out all the windows and shut off all the lights in the room where you're watching something. A projector being able to compete with ambient light and produce a clearly visible image while there is still light on around it isn't a talent often found in the cheap projector range this falls into.Most of the time these things cast an image which, in the presence of any competing ambient light, is very dim and hard to watch reliably which makes most of these little projectors poor choices for full-time home projector options.For us, that was mostly okay since we only really needed it for outdoor movie night and waiting until it was mostly dark outside wasn't a huge issue. Our other use case for it was in the basement for the winter months when "outdoor movie night" was the last thing on our mind (hello, Minnesota winters).In terms of interface, remotes, and bluetooth connectivity, this unit falls into the range of mediocrity with the rest. The bluetooth is significantly finnicky and (not surprisingly) either has to be an audio output or a video source input, not both at once. Not surprising, but it's not explicitly stated and based on the way the projector talks about its abilities, if you're not a big user of electronics, you might not know that's a likely limitation off the bat.If you opt for bluetooth video source in, whatever external speaker you use will need to use the aux output cable option (that cable you use to connect that phone of yours to the speakers in your car when you don't want to run down the battery using bluetooth), otherwise a bluetooth audio out option is available.All of this requires interaction with a menu screen using the remote or the on-unit buttons and the menu is pretty clumsy and the remote is VERY specific about where you need to point it at the unit to make it accept the button presses.***Overall Value***The picture might be brighter, but that's really the only advantage here and it's really not enough to justify a valuation of $200 (at the time of review) compared to others just like it for significantly less. It's on the upper end of the cheap projector scale, but it's a pretty low bar it's having to clear for that distinction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector and easy to pair with my computer!
reviews.reviewText: This was a game changer for me! I recently had a back surgery, so I could only lay on my back. This made it super hard to read books or watch tv because I'd constantly have to turn my neck. I used this projector to stream movies and shows onto my ceiling and it was PERFECT!! Picture quality is excellent and the sound coming from the projector was good enough! I'll hook it up to my better speakers later, but I am in love with this and will continue to use it in my living room on my big wall! You can use your phone to sync via bluetooth, but I found hooking up my computer to the projector via HDMI cord was the easiest way to watch all my paid subscription services. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Unit. Has Good Resolution and Brightness.
reviews.reviewText: OK, have to be honest, it took me (and my friend) forever to set this up and I was initially going to give this a less than average review. When we were finally able to set it up correctly (the issues were due to our oversight), our annoyance turned into enthusiasm; this projector has great potential. It is of great quality and comes with a carrying case. It is big, but not overly so, and the resolution is good, with a good brightness level and there is no over-heating. I do not have a projector screen, but I have a great white wall in my basement that works perfectly for this. This also comes with the user manual and remote control.The projector does have WiFi and Bluetooth capabilities, and is compatible with iOS and Android. Do note that it does have limitations when it comes to direct streaming. You cannot stream anything directly from streaming services; no Netflix, no Amazon, no YouTube or any other streaming service (due to HDCP protocol), and it does not support Dolby sound (due to copyright), however you can use a TV stick that allows you to view movies/shows from streaming services. Check the product details.Also note, I am no projector specialist or even mildly tech savvy. Since this is my first projector, I have nothing to compare this with, so in regards to the technical aspect of this unit, my review may be lacking in information. I can review the experience, the quality, the resolution, the sound, etc, and for right now (do note, my projector is still brand new and only been used a couple of times), this is passing with flying colours. My review may change if I encounter any issues with usage and time, or if I find it's lacking in certain areas or features. For now, I can only go with what's in front of me, and this is a good projector, and turning my basement to a movie theatre (or close to it) was a fun experience.

Image quand même belle pour le prix ainsi qu'une bonne luminosité dans une pièce sombre. le seul petit hic c'est que si je fais le focus le centre est clair mais les côtés sont flou sur un écran de 70" lorsqu'il ya presence de texte. La telecommande ne répond pas très bien. En général je suis assez satisfait pour le prix payer, je m'attendais à pire.

reviews.reviewTitle: きちんと保証されました！
reviews.reviewText: こちらの商品を昨年のブラックフライデーで購入したところ、一箇所だけドット抜けしておりましたが返品するほどでもないかなと気にせず使っておりました。とにかく画質、音響、明るさと、以前購入した他社プロジェクターとは比べものにならない程良かったので、ドット抜け一箇所くらい全然気にならなかったのでそのまま使っていたしだいです。しかしながら、使っているうちに少しドット抜けが増えてしまい…1年も経って今更無理かな…と諦め半分で問い合わせたところ、すぐにお返事をいただきドット抜け箇所の写真と購入日を送ったところ、その日のうちに新しい商品を手配していただきました！本当にありがとうございました。私的には、この価格で商品自体のスペックはもとよりサービスも一番素晴らしいのではないかと満足しております。Amazonファイアスティックも本体HDMIに差し込むだけで煩わしい設定もなく(当たり前ですがAmazonに繋げたあとはAmazonの方のリモコンを使用します。)本当に重宝しております。あと、ちょっと音響にこだわってオーディオコンボの左右のスピーカーに繋げてましたが、ある日普通に観てたら実はスピーカーに繋がってなく本体から音が出てたという事もあり、狭い部屋で観るのであれば本体だけで充分でした。ちなみに私の部屋はベッドの後方部(頭側)が出窓になっているのでそちらにプロジェクターと、両側にスピーカーを設置していますのでプロジェクターはベッドに背もたれた時に私の頭のすぐ後ろにくることになりますが映画が始まれば作動音は全く気になりません。足側にスクリーンを置いておりその距離だと80インチのスクリーンがピッタリでした。大画面で観るにはスクリーンから距離をとる必要があると思いますので大画面スクリーンを置けるか置けないかより、プロジェクターを置く距離を考えてスクリーンを購入した方が良いと思います。

reviews.reviewTitle: Bluetooth Connectivity, Wifi Enabled And Screen Mirroring🙂
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My daughter wants to have a birthday with her girlfriends. My wife and I were thinking about having an outdoor movie party and decided to grab the Touch projector. This isn’t our first projector, but we are looking for an upgrade with our current system.The first thing you can’t miss is the size of the actual projector. It has a good size to it, but it does come with a carrying case. On boot up you are greeted with a myriad of selections. First thing I tried was the Airplay feature. It did connect to my IPhone and I was mirror my screen. Unknown to me until I read the warranty section on screen, the projector cannot directly play movies from many streaming apps due to HDCP protocols. So you will need to connect a stick in order to stream from this device. Another interesting message states that due to copyright issues with Dolby you will have to choose sound options without Dolby. Be aware that it also says that the projector will be out of sync with frame rates below 60fps. Whew, just thought you should know!Next up was selecting the HDMI input to my Roger IPTV box. That worked no problem, I now have access to cable and all my paid streaming services. It performed great watching sports, news and movies. The sound is okay from the projector, I do find it needs to be turned up to a higher volume level. Depending on where you are watching your sports are movies you may need external speaker help. What I am really happy to see is both Wifi and Bluetooth capabilities. This is perfect for syncing one of my Bluetooth speakers to pump up the bass and volume to this system. The focusing of the lens of the projector is stiff and difficult to turn. Once it is in focus you get a nice picture on the screen. It’s never going to replace your Smart TV, but it serves as a fantastic movie theatre outside. I do like the fact that the keystone correction can be done to all four corner through a menu. This way you can get perfect corners without turning a dial or sliding a manual lever. ✅WHAT I LIKE: ▪️Even though the projector is bigger than most, they do provide you with a carrying case. ▪️Bluetooth connectivity is great to upgrade the onboard sound. ▪️Wifi enables you to connect to Airplay (Apple) or Miracast ( Android). ▪️When the Airplay is working is great to show off your pictures or videos from your Apple devices. ▪️Does not really get hot like other projectors, it’s warm to the touch. (The front is the warmest spot) ▪️The picture quality seems a notch above other projectors I have used. ❌WHAT I DON’T LIKE: ▪️No onboard controls!😳 You lose the remote and I have no clue how you could control the projector. ▪️The remote is not always responsive. The default volume was set to 100 and I had a hard time turning it down. Even moving from menu to menu, your experience some lag. You need to patient switching from setting and screens because I found the response delayed. ▪️No screen provided so you will need to purchase one separately or use a wall in your home. ▪️Airplay is not always stable and does disconnect on its own. 🦋OVERALL:The Touch projector is a nice machine that would make any family happy. It has enough features that keeps it on par with the competition. The picture quality seems to be above the competition in similar pricing category.

When I got this, I was expecting the average low cost projector. Flat colours, dull picture, lacking brightness unless in complete darkness. This unit turned out to be significantly better than previous units I've seen. Firstly, the colours are fairly vibrant. Secondly, the brightness is more than expected. You still need a darker space, obviously, but it's much more suitable in dimly lit spaces, outdoors, bedrooms, etc.. as opposed to totally dark areas.If I had a complaint, and it's the same for most of these devices, the menu's and UI are terrible. For me, not a problem, as I just plug a Firestick 4K into it, and use that instead. The actual controls and software are good enough, and allow you to control the functions of the unit easily enough. Keystone, flipping, etc.. are all easy to control.To add to this is a fairly good case that it comes in, as well as a solid remote, and some basic input cables, including a HDMI cable, and an actual AV cable. You should have no issues connecting most devices to this.Last point is sound, and I have virtually no expectations here, but it does have built in speakers. I don't recommend them, and would suggest you connect some external speakers, even via bluetooth if you can, to get proper sound.At the current price, without coupon, this comes in at around $200, which is not bad at all for what is a solid projector. I have an older higher end projector, which can just do 1080i barely, based on DLP, and the bulb for it costs more than this projector.
